description2: The aim of the study program is to prepare specialists in the diagnosis and therapy of individuals struggling with hypersexuality. The program emphasizes an interdisciplinary approach, combining knowledge from psychology, sexology, psychiatry, medicine, and behavioral therapy. Students will gain both theoretical knowledge and practical skills that will allow them to effectively help patients.
description3: The study program is divided into two semesters, including theoretical lectures, practical workshops, seminars, and professional internships.
